alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 13 at 6:37PM PST until December 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Frazier Mountain Communities, Tehachapi, Grapevine and South End San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi
